verses.roman:
vicchede vyākula prabhu calilā duḥkhī hañā
pāche kṛṣṇadāsa yāya jala-pātra lañā

synonyms: vicchede—in separation; vyākula—perturbed; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; calilā—went on; duḥkhī—unhappy; hañā—becoming; pāche—just behind; kṛṣṇadāsa—His servant Kṛṣṇadāsa; yāya—went; jala-pātra—the waterpot; lañā—taking.
translation: In separation, the Lord became very perturbed and walked on unhappily. His servant, Kṛṣṇadāsa, who was carrying His waterpot, followed behind.
